channel.title: SFoL13: Pestilence (BD & Alchemist Win!)
channel.description:
# I'll format the post better soon
# First there was Famine # Then came Pestilence
**Notes** 16 players Spiritualist and Revenant are not in play Fool and Masochist are not in play King can only start as Good, Evil, Devout or Cowardly There will be at least 1 Plague Doctor There will be at least 1 Carrier
**Mechanics** There's a Plague in Castle Adiart You will die 2 day/night cycles after contracting the plague You will not know you have the plague until 1 day/night cycle after you contract it If you visit someone who has the plague, you contract the plague If you are visited by someone who has the plague, you contract the plague 2 random players start with the plague Plague death cannot be prevented unless cured by a Plague Doctor or Quack
**New Classes** > ## [color=steblue]The Plague Doctor[/color] > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Support[/color]** **Antiplague (Passive)** - Immune to catching the plague. **Cure (Night)** - Cure a player of the plague. - Infinite uses _Your objective is to Eliminate the Unseen, The Cult, and any Neutrals who stand against you_
> ## [color=purple]The Q[/color][color=darkred]uack[/color] > **[color=purple]Unseen[/color] or [color=darkred]Cult[/color] Support** **Antiplague (Passive)** - Immune to catching the plague. **Outsider (Passive)** - You don't know who your faction teammates are, but don't count towards their faction limit. **Cure (Night)** - Cure a player of the plague. - Infinite uses _Your objective is to Eliminate the Blue Dragon and any Neutrals who stand against you_
> ## [color=#003300]The Carrier[/color] > **[color=gray]Neutral Offensive[/color]** **Patient Zero (Passive)** - You constantly carry the plague, and can't be cured of it, but you also can not die to the plague. **Spread Plague (Night)** - Spread the plague to a player. You must do this once every two nights or you will die. - Infinite uses _Your objective is to remain alive until the game ends_
The Great Unwashed: 1. Ashe - Dead 2. Damafaud - Dead 3. PolikShadowbliss - Dead 4. Vulgard - Alive 5. Icibalus - Alive 6. AgentBoiiiiiiii - Dead 7. Hippolytus - Dead 8. PokemonKidRyan - Dead 9. Wolfy - King - Alive 10. 3DT_CheesyKnives - Alive 11. Frostwolf103 - Alive 12. NuclearBurrito - Dead 13. SuperJack - Dead 14. NozBugz - Dead 15. Marluxion - Dead 16. Moleland - Alive
Graveyard: PokemonKidRyan - [color=darkred]**Cult Leader**[/color] - Executed Day 2 Damafaud - [color=#003300]**Carrier**[/color] - Died Night 2 AgentBoin - [color=green]**Druid**[/color] - Executed Day 3 Marluxion - [color=steblue]**Good King**[/color] - Died Night 3 PolikShadowbliss - [color=steblue]**Priest**[/color] - Died Night 3 NuclearBurrito - [color=steblue]**Maid**[/color] - Died Night 3 SuperJack - [color=darkred]**Cult Leader**[/color] - Executed Day 4 Ashe - [color=steblue]**Prince**[/color] - Died Night 4 Hippolytus - [color=steblue]**Squire**[/color] - Died Night 4 Nozbugz - [color=darkred]**Cult Leader**[/color] - Died Night 4

item.description:
He wasn’t p scummy but I PKR’s reaction of backpedalling when he realized frost had also claimed Plague Doctor came across as “oh shit I’m cc’ing my scumbuddy better change claim”. Still half-true I guess.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL13: Pestilence (BD & Alchemist Win!)
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Yeah, I didn’t think frost was cult either. The mass claim hastened the end of this, but no evil played well enough to deserve a win (Noz was kinda unlucky)

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL13: Pestilence (BD & Alchemist Win!)

item.description:
Well I thought Frost defended me too much to be Cult, although I might sound biased.

That would be amazing plot twist.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL13: Pestilence (BD & Alchemist Win!)
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
It was obvious there was one cult in the 2 Plague Doctors, as otherwise PKR would have just claimed one of you were lying when he realized there were already 2 PD claims. Instead he backtracked massively and switched claims, as he did not want to cc a fellow cult.

I have to admit I thought it was you Frost as opposed to Noz.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL13: Pestilence (BD & Alchemist Win!)
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
SuperJack:

People forgot that the Alcolote is able to send a message during the day.

Unfortunately, PKR wasn’t expecting there is actually second Plague Doctor who keep low profile.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL13: Pestilence (BD & Alchemist Win!)
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
It should be noted that there is a difference between Forum Mafia and Forum Of Lies
You just played a game of Forum of Lies with extra mechanics, but the cult mechanics are used by both of our informed minorities.
Forum Mafia is basically anything that isn’t this or simmilar to this.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL13: Pestilence (BD & Alchemist Win!)
item.dc:creator: SuperJack
item.description:
Yes/No.

Normally yes.

But in games where there are numinous non-convertible roles, and also town confirmed roles, along with the addition that if you need to get rid of these town confirmed roles you need to sacrifice one of your own, its less much less OP in forum games.
Also note, that I just personally hate cult games :S

The roles look fun to play though.

Read full topic

item.description:
Cult converting every night was judged as Op.

Read full topic

I tried to convert you but was told about a cult recruit cooldown.

item.title: SFoL13: Pestilence (BD & Alchemist Win!)
item.dc:creator: SuperJack
item.description:
Wanted to pick a role that people wouldn’t think cult would pick, also needed to keep the plague alive as it was the best way to allow killing to happen.

People forgot that the Alcolote is able to send a message during the day.
So Quacks can easily know who their scum mates are.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL13: Pestilence (BD & Alchemist Win!)
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
However we caught two scum who tries to claim second non-unique.

If I was the cult leader, I would leave the plague doctor alone when claimed and picked someone else (preferrable investigative class that got infected later on and use that advantage to spread to many people as possible, and then convert someone else and let the infected cultist die that way, because I think BoM is touching the infected as cult leader and I don’t want that)

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL13: Pestilence (BD & Alchemist Win!)
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
I don’t know that is unnecessary, for me it’s better to be safe than sorry.

Read full topic
